## PlayerProps interface

Props for the player view.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface PlayerProps extends PropsWithRef<{
    config?: PlayerConfig;
    style?: ViewStyle;
    onEvent?: (event: Event) => void;
    onReady?: (event: Event) => void;
    onPlay?: (event: PlayEvent) => void;
}> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> PropsWithRef&lt;{ config?: PlayerConfig; style?: ViewStyle; onEvent?: (event: Event) =&gt; void; onReady?: (event: Event) =&gt; void; onPlay?: (event: PlayEvent
